product_name: The North Face Base Camp Crimp Daypack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Base Camp Crimp Daypack offers durability in a slim, minimalist design. It's built from the same rugged waterproof fabric as The North Face Base Camp duffels. Made from heavy-duty 300-denier phthalate-free thermoplastic elastomer laminate and 840-denier ballistics nylon, this pack is ready for anything you can dish at it. Padded back panel with a breathable spine channel helps keep you comfortable and dry. Large main compartment has organization pockets and accommodates most 13-in. laptops in a dedicated sleeve. The North Face Base Camp Crimp Daypack features a durable, water-resistant zipper. Contoured padded shoulder straps; removable webbing hipbelt and sternum strap; dual daisy-chain loops. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Base Camp Crimp Daypack offers durability in a slim, minimalist design. It's built from the same rugged waterproof fabric as The North Face Base Camp duffels.
